channel.title: News on Applied Data Science & Artificial Intelligence
channel.description: Recent content in News on Applied Data Science & Artificial Intelligence

item.title: ADSAI Open Day
item.description: ADSAI 2023 Open day The ADSAI 2023 Open Day is an opportunity to meet, in person or online, the ADSAI faculty. Join us to see a presentation of the ADSAI PhD program, with talks from the ADSAI director and the coordinators of the three main ADSAI curricula, as well as to meet students that will discuss their PhD at ADSAI.

item.title: First call for 2023 is out!
item.description: The first call for application of 2023 is out The first call for application of 2023 is out. There are 15 funded scholarships available and 2 additional non-funded scholarships. Please visit the application page for further details. We are organizing an Open Day in early June to present the programme, stay tuned for more information soon!
